job description:
Strategic Analysis, Inc., (SA) seeks data scientist to provide technical support and expertise in information extraction, information retrieval, and human-in-the-loop interaction.

Required Experience and Skills:
  • Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Finance or similar discipline
Experience and Skills:
  • Two plus (2+) years of work experience in three of the following six fields (not prioritized): Machine learning; Deep learning; Human language technology and HLT evaluation; Natural language processing; Collection and annotation of large-scale corpora; Program management support for a large research program.
  • Demonstrated ability to manage multiple, concurrent tasks proactively.
Desired Experience and Skills:
  • Two years' experience in the Intelligence Community (IC), including experience with requirements, CONOPS, and transition.
  • Experience managing a multi-agency, multi-disciplinary test and evaluation team.
  • Technical support and expertise in information extraction, information retrieval, and human-in-the-loop interaction
Clearance:
  • Ability to obtain security clearance; TS/SCI with polygraph, preferred
